price: 115. Oo samir yeelo; hubaal, Alle ma dayaco ajarka sama falayaasha.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir fa-inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
